trans-unit.source: Represents a large object binary (<xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""></xref>) data type stored on an Oracle server.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et stort objekt binær (<xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""></xref>) datatypen som er lagret på en Oracle-server.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: An OracleLob differs from an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> in that the data is stored on the server instead of in a physical file in the operating system.
trans-unit.target: En OracleLob er forskjellig fra en <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>at dataene lagres på serveren i stedet for i en fysisk fil i operativsystemet.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>

trans-unit.source: It can also be a read-write object, unlike an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>, which is always read-only.
trans-unit.target: Det kan også være et objekt med lese-og skrivetilgang, i motsetning til en <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>, som alltid er skrivebeskyttet.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>

trans-unit.source: An OracleLob may be one of these <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType> data types.
trans-unit.target: En OracleLob kan være en av disse <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType>datatyper.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType>

trans-unit.source: |OracleType data type|Description| |--------------------------|-----------------| |`Blob`|An Oracle `BLOB` data type that contains binary data with a maximum size of 4 gigabytes (GB).
trans-unit.target: | Datatypen for OracleType | Beskrivelse | |--------------------------|-----------------| | `Blob`| En Oracle `BLOB` datatype som inneholder binære data med en maksimal størrelse på 4 gigabyte (GB).

trans-unit.source: This maps to an <xref:System.Array> of type <xref:System.Byte>.| |`Clob`|An Oracle `CLOB` data type that contains character data, based on the default character set on the server, with a maximum size of 4 GB.
trans-unit.target: Dette er tilordnet til en <xref:System.Array>av typen <xref:System.Byte>. | | `Clob`| En Oracle `CLOB` datatype som inneholder tegndata, basert på standard tegn som er angitt på serveren, med en maksimal størrelse på 4 GB.</xref:System.Byte> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: This maps to <xref:System.String>.| |`NClob`|An Oracle `NCLOB` data type that contains character data, based on the national character set on the server with a maximum size of 4 GB.
trans-unit.target: Dette er tilordnet til <xref:System.String>. | | `NClob`| En Oracle `NCLOB` datatype som inneholder tegndata, basert på national tegnsettet på serveren med maksimumsstørrelsen på 4 GB.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This maps to <xref:System.String>.| A .NET application developer can retrieve the Oracle `LOB` values into basic .NET data types, such as <xref:System.Array> of type <xref:System.Byte> and <xref:System.String>, or the specialized OracleLob data type.
trans-unit.target: Dette er tilordnet til <xref:System.String>. | En .NET-programutvikler kan hente Oracle `LOB` verdier til basic .NET-datatyper som <xref:System.Array>av typen <xref:System.Byte>og <xref:System.String>, eller datatypen spesialiserte OracleLob.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Byte> </xref:System.Array> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The OracleLob class supports reading data from and writing to the Oracle `LOB` in the Oracle database.
trans-unit.target: OracleLob klassen støtter lesing av data fra og skrives til Oracle `LOB` i Oracle-database.

trans-unit.source: The following are the main characteristics of an OracleLob data type that distinguish it from basic .NET data types: - After you retrieve the Oracle `LOB` value from the Oracle database into the OracleLob class, you can change the `LOB` data in an open transaction and your changes are directly reflected to the database.
trans-unit.target: Følgende er de primære egenskapene til datatypen OracleLob som skiller fra grunnleggende .NET-datatyper: – Når du hente Oracle `LOB` verdien fra Oracle-database i klassen OracleLob, kan du endre det `LOB` data i en åpen transaksjon og endringene gjenspeiles direkte til databasen.

trans-unit.source: If you retrieve the Oracle `LOB` value into an <xref:System.Array> of type <xref:System.Byte> or <xref:System.String> and update these arrays, your changes are not reflected to the database.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du hente Oracle `LOB` verdi til en <xref:System.Array>av typen <xref:System.Byte>eller <xref:System.String>og oppdatere disse matriser ikke endringene til databasen.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Byte> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: - When you use the OracleLob class to access a chunk of a `LOB` value, only that chunk is passed from the Oracle database to the client.
trans-unit.target: -Når du bruker klassen OracleLob å få tilgang til en del av en `LOB` verdi, bare at gruppen er sendt fra Oracle-databasen til klienten.

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.GetChars%2A> method to access a chunk of a `LOB` value, the entire contents of the value are passed from the Oracle database to the client.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.GetChars%2A>metode for å få tilgang til en del av en `LOB` verdi, hele innholdet i verdien er sendt fra Oracle-databasen til klienten.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.GetChars%2A>

trans-unit.source: To obtain an OracleLob object, call the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.GetOracleLob%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å få et OracleLob-objekt, kan du kalle den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.GetOracleLob%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.GetOracleLob%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can construct an OracleLob that is NULL using this format: ``` OracleLob myLob = OracleLob.Null; ``` This technique is used primarily to test whether a `LOB` returned from the server is NULL, as this example illustrates: ``` If(myLob == OracleLob.Null) ``` A NULL `LOB` behaves similarly to a zero-byte `LOB` in that <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Read%2A> succeeds and always returns zero bytes.
trans-unit.target: Du kan lage en OracleLob som er NULL med dette formatet: ``` OracleLob myLob = OracleLob.Null; ``` denne metoden brukes først og fremst for å teste om en `LOB` returnert fra serveren er NULL, som dette eksemplet viser: ``` If(myLob == OracleLob.Null) ``` en NULL `LOB` fungerer på samme måte som en null-byte `LOB` i den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Read%2A>lykkes, og returnerer alltid null byte.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: Selecting a `LOB` column that contains a null value returns <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Null>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du velger en `LOB` kolonne som inneholder en nullverdi returnerer <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Null>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Null>

trans-unit.source: You must begin a transaction before obtaining a temporary `LOB`.
trans-unit.target: Du må starte en transaksjon før henting av en midlertidig `LOB`.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader> may fail to obtain data later.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>kan ikke hente data senere.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>

trans-unit.source: You can also open a temporary `LOB` in Oracle by calling the DBMS_LOB.CREATETEMPORARY system stored procedure and binding a `LOB` output parameter.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også åpne en midlertidig `LOB` i Oracle ved å ringe DBMS_LOB. CREATETEMPORARY system lagrede prosedyren og bindingen en `LOB` utdataparameter.

trans-unit.source: On the client side, a temporary `LOB` behaves like a table-based `LOB`.
trans-unit.target: På klientsiden, en midlertidig `LOB` fungerer som en tabellbasert `LOB`.

trans-unit.source: For example, to update the temporary `LOB`, it must be enclosed in a transaction.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel for å oppdatere midlertidige `LOB`, den må være angitt i en transaksjon.

trans-unit.source: The following C# example demonstrates how to open a temporary `LOB`.
trans-unit.target: C# eksemplet nedenfor viser hvordan du åpner en midlertidig `LOB`.

trans-unit.source: ``` OracleConnection connection = new OracleConnection("server=MyServer; integrated security=yes;"); connection.Open(); OracleTransaction transaction = connection.BeginTransaction(); OracleCommand command = connection.CreateCommand(); command.Transaction = transaction; command.CommandText = "declare xx blob; begin dbms_lob.createtemporary(xx, false, 0); :tempblob := xx; end;"; command.Parameters.Add(new OracleParameter("tempblob", OracleType.Blob)).Direction = ParameterDirection.Output; command.ExecuteNonQuery(); OracleLob tempLob = (OracleLob)command.Parameters[0].Value; byte[] tempbuff = new byte[10000]; tempLob.BeginBatch(OracleLobOpenMode.ReadWrite); tempLob.Write(tempbuff,0,tempbuff.Length); tempLob.EndBatch(); command.Parameters.Clear(); command.CommandText = "MyTable.MyProc"; command.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure; command.Parameters.Add(new OracleParameter("ImportDoc", OracleType.Blob)).Value = tempLob; command.ExecuteNonQuery(); transaction.Commit(); connection.Close ``` > [!NOTE] > The inherited <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteByte%2A> method fails if used with character data, and an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: ``` OracleConnection connection = new OracleConnection("server=MyServer; integrated security=yes;"); connection.Open(); OracleTransaction transaction = connection.BeginTransaction(); OracleCommand command = connection.CreateCommand(); command.Transaction = transaction; command.CommandText = "declare xx blob; begin dbms_lob.createtemporary(xx, false, 0); :tempblob := xx; end;"; command.Parameters.Add(new OracleParameter("tempblob", OracleType.Blob)).Direction = ParameterDirection.Output; command.ExecuteNonQuery(); OracleLob tempLob = (OracleLob)command.Parameters[0].Value; byte[] tempbuff = new byte[10000]; tempLob.BeginBatch(OracleLobOpenMode.ReadWrite); tempLob.Write(tempbuff,0,tempbuff.Length); tempLob.EndBatch(); command.Parameters.Clear(); command.CommandText = "MyTable.MyProc"; command.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure; command.Parameters.Add(new OracleParameter("ImportDoc", OracleType.Blob)).Value = tempLob; command.ExecuteNonQuery(); transaction.Commit(); connection.Close ``` > [!NOTE]> Arvet <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteByte%2A>metoden mislykkes hvis brukes med tegndata, og en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>forårsakes.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteByte%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Write%2A> method instead.
trans-unit.target: Bruk den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Write%2A>metoden i stedet.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Write%2A>

trans-unit.source: > > Temporary `LOB`s are only closed when the connection is closed, but with pooling and under load, temporary `LOB`s do not close.
trans-unit.target: >> Midlertidig `LOB`s er bare lukkes når tilkoblingen er lukket, men med pooling og belastet, midlertidig `LOB`s ikke Lukk.

trans-unit.source: This can be resolved by disposing the temporary `LOB`, by invoking `tempLob.Dispose()`.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan løses ved vinningsberegninger midlertidige `LOB`, ved å bruke `tempLob.Dispose()`.

trans-unit.source: Appends data from the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""></xref> to the current <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Tilføyer data fra den angitte <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""> </xref> til gjeldende <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started.
trans-unit.target: Ikke skrive til den `LOB`, må du har hentet av `LOB` bruker FOR UPDATE-setningsdelen i SQL SELECT-setningen, og du må ha en lokal transaksjon startet.

trans-unit.source: All data from the source `LOB` is appended to the end of the current `LOB`.
trans-unit.target: Alle data fra datakilden `LOB` føyes til slutten av gjeldende `LOB`.

trans-unit.source: The position of neither `LOB` is evaluated or changed during this process.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av ingen `LOB` er evaluert eller endret under denne prosessen.

trans-unit.source: The underlying data types must always be the same.
trans-unit.target: Datatypene underliggende må alltid være den samme.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are appending from an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType>, the destination <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> must also be an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du tilføyer fra et <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType>mål <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>må også være <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType> for eksempel

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In this release, a write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but does not update the `LOB` on the server.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I denne versjonen, skriving til en skrivebeskyttet `LOB` blir kanskje vellykket, men oppdateres ikke den `LOB` på serveren.

trans-unit.source: In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` is updated.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet, lokalt kopi av det `LOB` er oppdatert.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, later read operations on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> object might return the results of the write operation.
trans-unit.target: Derfor senere leseoperasjoner på den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>objekt kan returnere resultatene av Skriveoperasjonen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""></xref> from which to append data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""> </xref> som skal føyes data.

trans-unit.source: The source <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref> is null.
trans-unit.target: Kilden <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref> er null.

trans-unit.source: The source <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref> is null, or the connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: Kilden <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref> er null, eller tilkoblingen er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The source <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref> object was closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: Kilden <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref> objektet er lukket eller fjernet.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en Oracle-feil.

trans-unit.source: Prevents server-side triggers from firing while performing multiple read operations.
trans-unit.target: Hindrer serversiden utløsere at under utføring av flere leseoperasjoner.

trans-unit.source: Opens the `LOB` in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLobOpenMode> mode; therefore, the `LOB` can only be read from, not written to, until the corresponding call to <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.EndBatch%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Åpner den `LOB` i <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLobOpenMode>modus; derfor den `LOB` kan bare lese fra, ikke skrive til, før det tilsvarende kallet til <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.EndBatch%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.EndBatch%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLobOpenMode>

trans-unit.source: To perform batch writes to the `LOB`, call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.BeginBatch%2A> with <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLobOpenMode>.
trans-unit.target: Til å utføre bunke skriver til den `LOB`, kaller du <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.BeginBatch%2A> <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLobOpenMode>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLobOpenMode> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.BeginBatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling BeginBatch more than one time within the same transaction currently throws the Oracle "ORA-22293: LOB already opened in the same transaction" error.
trans-unit.target: Kaller BeginBatch mer enn én gang i den samme transaksjonen for øyeblikket oppstår Oracle "ORA&22293;: LOB allerede er åpnet i den samme transaksjonen" feil.

trans-unit.source: In addition, if you obtain the `LOB` using another <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>, and the original caller has not called the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.EndBatch%2A> method, the same error is generated.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du hente det `LOB` ved hjelp av en annen <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>, og opprinnelige oppkalleren har ikke kalles i <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.EndBatch%2A>metode, samme feil genereres.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.EndBatch%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.EndBatch%2A> method when you are finished using the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>.
trans-unit.target: Du må derfor kalle <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.EndBatch%2A>metoden når du er ferdig med <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.EndBatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: The connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingen er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The object was closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: Objektet er lukket eller fjernet.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en Oracle-feil.

trans-unit.source: Prevents server-side triggers from firing while performing multiple read and write operations in the specified access mode.
trans-unit.target: Hindrer serversiden utløsere utløses under utføring av flere og skriveoperasjoner i den angitte tilgangsmodusen.

trans-unit.source: To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started.
trans-unit.target: Ikke skrive til den `LOB`, må du har hentet av `LOB` bruker FOR UPDATE-setningsdelen i SQL SELECT-setningen, og du må ha en lokal transaksjon startet.

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.BeginBatch%2A> more than one time within the same transaction currently throws the Oracle "ORA-22293: LOB already opened in the same transaction" error.
trans-unit.target: Kaller <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.BeginBatch%2A>mer enn én gang i den samme transaksjonen for øyeblikket oppstår Oracle "ORA&22293;: LOB allerede er åpnet i den samme transaksjonen" feil.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.BeginBatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition, if you obtain the `LOB` using another <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>, and the original caller has not called the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.EndBatch%2A> method, the same error is generated.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du hente det `LOB` ved hjelp av en annen <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>, og opprinnelige oppkalleren har ikke kalles i <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.EndBatch%2A>metode, samme feil genereres.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.EndBatch%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.EndBatch%2A> method when you are finished using the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>.
trans-unit.target: Du må derfor kalle <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.EndBatch%2A>metoden når du er ferdig med <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.EndBatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: Mode (one of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLobOpenMode"></xref> values) in which the <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""></xref> can be accessed between this BeginBatch call and the corresponding <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.EndBatch*> call.
trans-unit.target: Modus (én av de <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLobOpenMode"> </xref> verdier) som den <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""> </xref> får mellom BeginBatch kallet og tilhørende <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.EndBatch*>kall.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.EndBatch*>

trans-unit.source: The connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingen er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The object was closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: Objektet er lukket eller fjernet.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en Oracle-feil.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""></xref> stream can be read.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""> </xref> kan kopiere dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""></xref> stream supports reading, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if a <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""></xref> is closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""> </xref> Dataflyten støtter lesing, ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis en <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""> </xref> er lukket eller fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether forward and backward seek operations can be performed.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om fremover og bakover søk kan utføres.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if a <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""></xref> is closed or disposed, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>Hvis en <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""> </xref> er lukket eller fjernet, ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Null"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Null"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Always returns true, regardless of whether the <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""></xref> supports writing or not.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer alltid SANN, uavhengig om det <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""> </xref> støtter skriving eller ikke.

trans-unit.source: To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have started a local transaction.
trans-unit.target: Ikke skrive til den `LOB`, må du har hentet av `LOB` bruker FOR UPDATE-setningsdelen i SQL SELECT-setningen, og du må har startet en lokal transaksjon.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, regardless of whether an opened or undisposed <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""></xref> supports writing or not, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if a <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""></xref> is closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer alltid <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, uavhengig av om en åpnet eller undisposed <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""> </xref> støtter skriving eller ikke, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis en <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""> </xref> er lukket eller fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the minimum number of bytes to retrieve from or send to the server during a read/write operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir minimum antall byte som skal hente fra eller sender til serveren under en operasjon for lese-og skrivetilgang.

trans-unit.source: The value returned by the ChunkSize property is not a setting of the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som returneres av egenskapen gruppestørrelsen er ikke en innstilling for .NET Framework-dataleverandør for Oracle.

trans-unit.source: Instead, it is the value that the Oracle Call Interface (OCI) uses when communicating with the server.
trans-unit.target: Det er bare verdien Oracle kall grensesnittet (OCI) bruker ved kommunikasjon med serveren.

trans-unit.source: Use ChunkSize to ensure that client-side chunks are the same size.
trans-unit.target: Bruk gruppestørrelsen for å sikre at klientsiden biter har samme størrelse.

trans-unit.source: Reading or writing in smaller chunks does not cache data, and causes a less-optimized round trip to the server, because a full packet is not received or sent.
trans-unit.target: Lese eller skrive i mindre deler hurtigbufre ikke data, og fører til en mindre optimalisert tur-retur til serveren fordi en fullstendig pakke som ikke er mottatt eller sendt.

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of bytes to retrieve or send.
trans-unit.target: Minste antall byte som skal hente eller sende.

trans-unit.source: The connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingen er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The object was closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: Objektet er lukket eller fjernet.

trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en Oracle-feil.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref> object that references the same Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""></xref> as the original <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref> objektet som refererer til samme Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""> </xref> som opprinnelig <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The properties of the new <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> object initially have the same values as those of the original object.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper for den nye <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>objektet opprinnelig er de samme som i det opprinnelige objektet.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>

trans-unit.source: However, after the Clone is complete, each <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> object is independent from the other.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid etter klone er fullført, hver <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>objektet er uavhengig av hverandre.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>

trans-unit.source: For example, changing the value of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Position%2A> property on the original <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> does not change the value of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Position%2A> on the copy.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel endre verdien for den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Position%2A>egenskap i opprinnelige <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>ikke endre verdien for <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Position%2A>på kopien.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Position%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: Copies from this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref> to a destination <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kopier fra dette <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref> til et mål <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The underlying data types must always be the same.
trans-unit.target: Datatypene underliggende må alltid være den samme.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are copying from an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType>, the destination <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> must also be an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kopierer fra et <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType>mål <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>må også være <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType> for eksempel

trans-unit.source: If the destination offset is beyond the end of destination `LOB`, the `LOB` to which the data is being copied is extended.
trans-unit.target: Hvis målet forskyvningen er utenfor slutten av målet `LOB`, `LOB` dataene skal kopieres er utvidet.

trans-unit.source: The space between the end of the `LOB` and the destination offset beyond the end is padded with zeros for `BLOB` data types and spaces for `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types.
trans-unit.target: Avstanden mellom slutten av den `LOB` og mål-forskyvning utenfor slutten ut med nulltegn for `BLOB` datatyper og mellomrom for `CLOB` og `NCLOB` datatyper.

trans-unit.source: To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started.
trans-unit.target: Ikke skrive til den `LOB`, må du har hentet av `LOB` bruker FOR UPDATE-setningsdelen i SQL SELECT-setningen, og du må ha en lokal transaksjon startet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In this release, a write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but not update the `LOB` on the server.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I denne versjonen, skriving til en skrivebeskyttet `LOB` kan være vellykket, men ikke oppdatere den `LOB` på serveren.

trans-unit.source: In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` will be updated.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet, lokalt kopi av det `LOB` oppdateres.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, later read operations on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> object might return the results of the write operation.
trans-unit.target: Derfor senere leseoperasjoner på den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>objekt kan returnere resultatene av Skriveoperasjonen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>

trans-unit.source: > > The `CopyTo` method does not clear the contents of the destination `OracleLob` before performing the copy operation.
trans-unit.target: >> Den `CopyTo` metoden ikke fjerne innholdet i målet `OracleLob` før du utfører kopieringen.

trans-unit.source: The destination <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Målet <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes copied.
trans-unit.target: Antall byte kopieres.

trans-unit.source: This excludes any padded bytes.
trans-unit.target: Dette utelater alle polstret byte.

trans-unit.source: The specified in the destination parameter is null.
trans-unit.target: Den angitt i den destination -parameteren er null.

trans-unit.source: The operation is not within a transaction, the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref> object is null, or the connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: Operasjonen er ikke innenfor en transaksjon i <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref> objektet er null, eller tilkoblingen er lukket.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en Oracle-feil.

trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en Oracle-feil.

trans-unit.source: Erases the specified amount of data from this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sletter angitte mengden data fra denne <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The sum of the values in the `offset` and `amount` parameters can be greater than that of the size of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>.
trans-unit.target: Summen av verdiene i den `offset` og `amount` parametere kan være større enn størrelsen på <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, specifying a value greater than that returned by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Length%2A> property succeeds; however <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Erase%2A> only erases to the end of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>.
trans-unit.target: Derfor å angi en verdi som er større enn den som ble returnert av den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Length%2A>egenskapen lykkes; imidlertid <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Erase%2A>bare sletter til slutten av <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Erase%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: (Similarly, if a negative value is passed to `offset`, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Erase%2A> will succeed, but only erase starting from the beginning of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>.) This behavior is different from that of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Read%2A> and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Write%2A> methods, and offers the advantage of being able to erase all data from the value specified by `offset` without making an additional roundtrip to the server to verify the actual size.
trans-unit.target: (På samme måte hvis en negativ verdi er sendt til `offset`, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Erase%2A>lykkes, men bare slette starter fra begynnelsen av den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>.)</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Erase%2A> Dette er forskjellig fra verdien for den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Read%2A>og <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Write%2A>metoder og tilbud fordelen ved å slette alle data fra verdien som er angitt av `offset` uten å gjøre en ekstra tur-retur til serveren for å bekrefte faktisk størrelse.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Write%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Erase%2A> does not truncate data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Erase%2A>ikke kutte av data.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Erase%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `LOB` length remains the same for a `BLOB` data type, and the erased data is replaced by 0x00.
trans-unit.target: Den `LOB` lengden uendret for en `BLOB` datatype, og dataene slettes erstattes av 0x00.

trans-unit.source: `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types are replaced by spaces.
trans-unit.target: `CLOB`og `NCLOB` datatyper er erstattet med mellomrom.

trans-unit.source: To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started.
trans-unit.target: Ikke skrive til den `LOB`, må du har hentet av `LOB` bruker FOR UPDATE-setningsdelen i SQL SELECT-setningen, og du må ha en lokal transaksjon startet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In this release, a write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but does not update the `LOB` on the server.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I denne versjonen, skriving til en skrivebeskyttet `LOB` blir kanskje vellykket, men oppdateres ikke den `LOB` på serveren.

trans-unit.source: In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` is updated.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet, lokalt kopi av det `LOB` er oppdatert.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, later read operations on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> object might return the results of the write operation.
trans-unit.target: Derfor senere leseoperasjoner på den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>objekt kan returnere resultatene av Skriveoperasjonen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>

trans-unit.source: The offset from which to erase.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvningen som skal slettes.

trans-unit.source: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_CLOB" name="CLOB" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_NCLOB" name="NCLOB" href=""></xref> data types, this must be an even number.
trans-unit.target: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_CLOB" name="CLOB" href=""> </xref> og <xref uid="langword_csharp_NCLOB" name="NCLOB" href=""> </xref> datatyper, dette må være et partall.

trans-unit.source: The quantity of data, in bytes, to erase.
trans-unit.target: Antallet data, i byte til å slette.

trans-unit.source: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_CLOB" name="CLOB" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_NCLOB" name="NCLOB" href=""></xref> data types, this must be an even number.
trans-unit.target: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_CLOB" name="CLOB" href=""> </xref> og <xref uid="langword_csharp_NCLOB" name="NCLOB" href=""> </xref> datatyper, dette må være et partall.

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes erased.
trans-unit.target: Antall byte som er slettet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> may be one of the following <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType> data types.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>kan være én av følgende <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType>datatyper.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>

trans-unit.source: |OracleType data type|Description| |--------------------------|-----------------| |`Blob`|An Oracle `BLOB` data type that contains binary data with a maximum size of 4 gigabytes.
trans-unit.target: | Datatypen for OracleType | Beskrivelse | |--------------------------|-----------------| | `Blob`| En Oracle `BLOB` datatype som inneholder binære data med en maksimal størrelse på 4 GB.

trans-unit.source: This maps to an <xref:System.Array> of type <xref:System.Byte>.| |`Clob`|An Oracle `CLOB` data type that contains character data, based on the default character set on the server, with a maximum size of 4 gigabytes.
trans-unit.target: Dette er tilordnet til en <xref:System.Array>av typen <xref:System.Byte>. | | `Clob`| En Oracle `CLOB` datatype som inneholder tegndata, basert på standard tegn som er angitt på serveren, med en maksimal størrelse på 4 GB.</xref:System.Byte> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: This maps to <xref:System.String>.| |`NClob`|An Oracle `NCLOB` data type that contains character data, based on the national character set on the server with a maximum size of 4 gigabytes.
trans-unit.target: Dette er tilordnet til <xref:System.String>. | | `NClob`| En Oracle `NCLOB` datatype som inneholder tegndata, basert på national tegnsettet på serveren med maksimumsstørrelsen på 4 GB.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This maps to <xref:System.String>.|
trans-unit.target: Dette er tilordnet til <xref:System.String>. |</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""></xref> data types.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"> </xref> <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOB" name="LOB" href=""> </xref> datatyper.

trans-unit.source: Represents a null <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en null <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: You can construct an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> that is NULL using this format: ``` OracleLob myLob = OracleLOB.Null; ``` This technique is used primarily to test whether a `LOB` returned from the server is NULL, as this example illustrates: ``` If(myLob == OracleLob.Null) ``` A NULL `LOB` behaves similarly to a zero byte `LOB` in that <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Read%2A> succeeds and always returns zero bytes.
trans-unit.target: Du kan lage en <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>som er NULL med dette formatet: ``` OracleLob myLob = OracleLOB.Null; ``` denne metoden brukes først og fremst for å teste om en `LOB` returnert fra serveren er NULL, som dette eksemplet viser: ``` If(myLob == OracleLob.Null) ``` en NULL `LOB` fungerer på samme måte som en null byte `LOB` i den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Read%2A>lykkes, og returnerer alltid null byte.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Read%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current read position in the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref> stream.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende lese plassering i den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref> dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The stream must support seeking to get or set the position.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten må støtte søking ikke hente eller angi posisjonen.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.CanSeek%2A> property to determine whether the stream supports seeking.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.CanSeek%2A>til å fastslå om Dataflyten støtter søking.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.CanSeek%2A>

trans-unit.source: Seeking to any location beyond the length of the stream is supported.
trans-unit.target: Søking hvor som helst utover meldingens lengde dataflyten støttes.

trans-unit.source: Seeking to an odd position for `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types is also supported.
trans-unit.target: Søking til ulikt posisjon for `CLOB` og `NCLOB` datatyper støttes også.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Remarks section of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Read%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon i avsnittet Merknader for den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Read%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Position property does not keep track of the number of bytes from the stream that have been consumed, skipped, or both.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen posisjon ikke holde oversikt over antall byte fra dataflyt som har blitt brukt, hoppet over, eller begge deler.

trans-unit.source: The current position within the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref> stream.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende plassering i den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref> dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingen er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The object was closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: Objektet er lukket eller fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Reads a sequence of bytes from the current <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref> stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: Leser en sekvens med byte fra gjeldende <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref> strøm- og forskudd posisjonen i dataflyten ved antall byte lest.

trans-unit.source: The Read method reads a maximum of `count` bytes from the current stream and stores them in `buffer` beginning at `offset`.
trans-unit.target: Metoden lese leser maksimalt `count` byte fra gjeldende flyten og lagrer dem i `buffer` Start fra `offset`.

trans-unit.source: The current position within the stream is advanced by the number of bytes read; however, if an exception occurs, the current position within the stream remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende plassering i dataflyten Avansert på antall byte lest; Hvis det oppstår et unntak, forblir imidlertid gjeldende plassering i dataflyten uendret.

trans-unit.source: Read returns the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: Les returnerer antall byte som leses.

trans-unit.source: The return value is zero only if the position is currently at the end of the stream.
trans-unit.target: Den returnerte verdien er null hvis posisjonen er for øyeblikket på slutten av dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: Read will block until at least one byte of data can be read, in the event that no data is available.Read returns 0 if you attempt to read from a `LOB` when the current position is at the end of `LOB`.
trans-unit.target: Les blokkerer til minst én byte med data kan leses, at ingen data er tilgjengelig. Lese returnerer 0 Hvis du prøver å lese fra en `LOB` når gjeldende posisjon er på slutten av `LOB`.

trans-unit.source: Read can return fewer bytes than requested even if the end of the stream has not been reached.
trans-unit.target: Les kan returnere færre byte enn forespurte selv om slutten på dataflyten ikke er nådd.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle handles all `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data as Unicode.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework-dataleverandør for Oracle behandler alle `CLOB` og `NCLOB` data som Unicode.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when accessing `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types, you are always dealing with the number of bytes, where each character is 2 bytes.
trans-unit.target: Derfor under tilgang til `CLOB` og `NCLOB` -datatyper du alltid har med antall byte, der hvert tegn er 2 byte.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a string of text containing three characters is saved as an `NCLOB` on an Oracle server where the character set is 4 bytes per character, and you perform a `Read` operation, you specify the length of the string as 6 bytes, although it is stored as 12 bytes on the server.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en streng som inneholder tre tegn lagres som for eksempel en `NCLOB` på en Oracle-server der tegnsettet 4 byte per tegn, og du utføre en `Read` operasjonen du angi lengden på strengen som 6 byte, selv om det er lagret som 12 byte på serveren.

trans-unit.source: The following C# example demonstrates how to read <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> objects.
trans-unit.target: C# eksemplet viser hvordan du lese <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>objekter.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>

trans-unit.source: ``` public static void ReadLobExample(OracleCommand command) { int actual = 0; //Select some data. // Table Schema: // "CREATE TABLE TableWithLobs (a int, b BLOB, c CLOB, d NCLOB)"; // "INSERT INTO TableWithLobs values (1, 'AA', 'AAA', N'AAAA')"; command.CommandText = "SELECT * FROM TableWithLobs"; OracleDataReader reader = command.ExecuteReader(); using(reader) { //Obtain the first row of data. reader.Read(); //Obtain the LOBs (all 3 varieties). OracleLob BLOB = reader.GetOracleLob(1); OracleLob CLOB = reader.GetOracleLob(2); OracleLob NCLOB = reader.GetOracleLob(3); //Example - Reading binary data (in chunks). byte[] buffer = new byte[100]; while((actual = BLOB.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) >0) Console.WriteLine(BLOB.LobType + ".Read(" + buffer + ", " + buffer.Length + ") => " + actual); //Example - Reading CLOB/NCLOB data (in chunks). //Note: You can read character data as raw Unicode bytes (using OracleLob.Read as in the above example). //However, because the OracleLob object inherits directly from the.NET stream object, //all the existing classes that manipluate streams can also be used. For example, the //.NET StreamReader makes converting the raw bytes into actual characters easier. StreamReader streamreader = new StreamReader(CLOB, Encoding.Unicode); char[] cbuffer = new char[100]; while((actual = streamreader.Read(cbuffer, 0, cbuffer.Length)) >0) Console.WriteLine(CLOB.LobType + ".Read(" + new string(cbuffer, 0, actual) + ", " + cbuffer.Length + ") => " + actual); //Example - Reading data (all at once). //You could use StreamReader.ReadToEnd to obtain all the string data,or simply //call OracleLob.Value to obtain a contiguous allocation of all the data. Console.WriteLine(NCLOB.LobType + ".Value => " + NCLOB.Value); } } ``` You can construct an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> that is NULL using this format: ``` OracleLob myLob = OracleLob.Null; ``` This technique is used primarily to test whether a `LOB` returned from the server is NULL, as the following example illustrates.
trans-unit.target: ``` public static void ReadLobExample(OracleCommand command) { int actual = 0; //Select some data. // Table Schema: // "CREATE TABLE TableWithLobs (a int, b BLOB, c CLOB, d NCLOB)"; // "INSERT INTO TableWithLobs values (1, 'AA', 'AAA', N'AAAA')"; command.CommandText = "SELECT * FROM TableWithLobs"; OracleDataReader reader = command.ExecuteReader(); using(reader) { //Obtain the first row of data. reader.Read(); //Obtain the LOBs (all 3 varieties). OracleLob BLOB = reader.GetOracleLob(1); OracleLob CLOB = reader.GetOracleLob(2); OracleLob NCLOB = reader.GetOracleLob(3); //Example - Reading binary data (in chunks). byte[] buffer = new byte[100]; while((actual = BLOB.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) >0) Console.WriteLine(BLOB.LobType + ".Read(" + buffer + ", " + buffer.Length + ") => " + actual); //Example - Reading CLOB/NCLOB data (in chunks). //Note: You can read character data as raw Unicode bytes (using OracleLob.Read as in the above example). //However, because the OracleLob object inherits directly from the.NET stream object, //all the existing classes that manipluate streams can also be used. For example, the //.NET StreamReader makes converting the raw bytes into actual characters easier. StreamReader streamreader = new StreamReader(CLOB, Encoding.Unicode); char[] cbuffer = new char[100]; while((actual = streamreader.Read(cbuffer, 0, cbuffer.Length)) >0) Console.WriteLine(CLOB.LobType + ".Read(" + new string(cbuffer, 0, actual) + ", " + cbuffer.Length + ") => " + actual); //Example - Reading data (all at once). //You could use StreamReader.ReadToEnd to obtain all the string data,or simply //call OracleLob.Value to obtain a contiguous allocation of all the data. Console.WriteLine(NCLOB.LobType + ".Value => " + NCLOB.Value); } } ```Du kan lage en <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>som er NULL med dette formatet: ``` OracleLob myLob = OracleLob.Null; ``` denne metoden brukes først og fremst for å teste om en `LOB` returnert fra serveren er NULL, som følgende eksempel illustrerer.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>

trans-unit.source: ``` If(myLob == OracleLob.Null) ``` A NULL `LOB` behaves similarly to a zero byte `LOB` in that Read succeeds and always returns zero bytes.
trans-unit.target: ``` If(myLob == OracleLob.Null) ```En NULL `LOB` fungerer på samme måte som en null byte `LOB` fordi lese lykkes og alltid returnerer null byte.

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: En bytematrise.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, the buffer contains the specified byte array with the values between `offset` and (`offset` + `count`) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.
trans-unit.target: Låse denne metoden, bufferen inneholder den angitte Bytematrisen med verdiene mellom `offset` og (`offset` + `count`) erstattet med byte lest fra den gjeldende kilden.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based byte offset in `buffer` at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvning nullbasert byte i `buffer` vil begynne å lagre dataene lese fra gjeldende dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_CLOB" name="CLOB" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_NCLOB" name="NCLOB" href=""></xref> data types, this must be an even number.
trans-unit.target: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_CLOB" name="CLOB" href=""> </xref> og <xref uid="langword_csharp_NCLOB" name="NCLOB" href=""> </xref> datatyper, dette må være et partall.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall byte som leses fra den gjeldende dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_CLOB" name="CLOB" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_NCLOB" name="NCLOB" href=""></xref> data types, this must be an even number.
trans-unit.target: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_CLOB" name="CLOB" href=""> </xref> og <xref uid="langword_csharp_NCLOB" name="NCLOB" href=""> </xref> datatyper, dette må være et partall.

trans-unit.source: The total number of bytes read into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: Totalt antall byte som leses, til bufferen.

trans-unit.source: This may be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være mindre enn antall byte som ble forespurt hvis mange byte er ikke tilgjengelig for øyeblikket, eller null (0) Hvis slutten på dataflyten er nådd.

trans-unit.source: The buffer is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Den buffer er en nullreferanse ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: A value in the offset or count parameter is not positive.
trans-unit.target: En verdi i den offset eller count parameteren er positive.

trans-unit.source: -or- The sum of the offset and count parameters is larger than the buffer length.
trans-unit.target: - eller - summen av parameterne forskyvningen og antallet er større enn bufferlengden.

trans-unit.source: -or- A value specified in the amount or offset parameter is less than zero or greater than 4 gigabytes.
trans-unit.target: - eller - en verdi som er angitt i den amount eller offset parameteren er mindre enn null eller større enn 4 GB.

trans-unit.source: The operation is not within a transaction, the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref> object is null, or the connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: Operasjonen er ikke innenfor en transaksjon i <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref> objektet er null, eller tilkoblingen er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The object was closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: Objektet er lukket eller fjernet.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en Oracle-feil.

trans-unit.source: Sets the position on the current <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref> stream.
trans-unit.target: Angir posisjonen i gjeldende <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref> dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: If `offset` is negative, the new position must precede the position specified by `origin` by the number of bytes specified by `offset`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `offset` er negativ, den nye plasseringen må være før plasseringen angitt av `origin` av antall byte som er angitt av `offset`.

trans-unit.source: If `offset` is zero, the new position must be the position specified by `origin`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `offset` er null, den nye plasseringen må være plasseringen angitt av `origin`.

trans-unit.source: If `offset` is positive, the new position must follow the position specified by `origin` by the number of bytes specified by `offset`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `offset` er positivt, den nye plasseringen må følge plasseringen angitt av `origin` av antall byte som er angitt av `offset`.

trans-unit.source: Seeking to any location beyond the length of the stream is supported.
trans-unit.target: Søking hvor som helst utover meldingens lengde dataflyten støttes.

trans-unit.source: Seeking to an odd position for `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types is also supported.
trans-unit.target: Søking til ulikt posisjon for `CLOB` og `NCLOB` datatyper støttes også.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Remarks section of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Read%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon i avsnittet Merknader for den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Read%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: A byte offset relative to origin.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvning i forhold til kommer fra en byte.

trans-unit.source: If `offset` is negative, the new position precedes the position specified by `origin` by the number of bytes specified by `offset`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `offset` er negativ, den nye posisjonen kommer før plasseringen angitt av `origin` av antall byte som er angitt av `offset`.

trans-unit.source: If `offset` is zero, the new position is the position specified by `origin`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `offset` er null, den nye stillingen er plasseringen angitt av `origin`.

trans-unit.source: If `offset` is positive, the new position follows the position specified by `origin` by the number of bytes specified by `offset`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `offset` er positivt, den nye posisjonen følger plasseringen angitt av `origin` av antall byte som er angitt av `offset`.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.IO.SeekOrigin> indicating the reference point used to obtain the new position.
trans-unit.target: En verdi av typen <xref:System.IO.SeekOrigin>angir referanse brukes til å få ny posisjon.</xref:System.IO.SeekOrigin>

trans-unit.source: The new position within the current stream.
trans-unit.target: Den nye posisjonen i gjeldende dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The origin parameter does not contain a valid value.
trans-unit.target: Den origin parameteren inneholder ikke en gyldig verdi.

trans-unit.source: The resulting position is beyond the length of the value.
trans-unit.target: Den resulterende posisjonen er utenfor lengden på verdien.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref> object was closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref> objektet er lukket eller fjernet.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en Oracle-feil.

trans-unit.source: Sets the length of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref> stream to a value less than the current length.
trans-unit.target: Angir hvor lang den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref> stream til en verdi mindre enn gjeldende lengde.

trans-unit.source: An attempt to increase the length of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> stream fails, and returns "Message: ORA-22926: specified trim length is greater than current LOB value's length" from the Oracle server.
trans-unit.target: Et forsøk på å øke lengden på den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>dataflyten mislykkes, og returnerer "melding: ORA&22926;: angitt trim Adresselengden er større enn gjeldende LOB-verdien" fra Oracle-serveren.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>

trans-unit.source: A stream must support both writing and seeking for SetLength to function.
trans-unit.target: En dataflyt må støtte både skrive- og søking for SetLength til funksjonen.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle handles all `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data as Unicode.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework-dataleverandør for Oracle behandler alle `CLOB` og `NCLOB` data som Unicode.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when accessing `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types, you are always dealing with the number of bytes, where each character is 2 bytes.
trans-unit.target: Derfor under tilgang til `CLOB` og `NCLOB` -datatyper du alltid har med antall byte, der hvert tegn er 2 byte.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a string of text containing three characters is saved as an `NCLOB` on an Oracle server where the character set is 4 bytes per character, and you perform a `SetLength` operation, you specify the length of the string as 6 bytes, although it is stored as 12 bytes on the server.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en streng som inneholder tre tegn lagres som for eksempel en `NCLOB` på en Oracle-server der tegnsettet 4 byte per tegn, og du utføre en `SetLength` operasjonen du angi lengden på strengen som 6 byte, selv om det er lagret som 12 byte på serveren.

trans-unit.source: To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started.
trans-unit.target: Ikke skrive til den `LOB`, må du har hentet av `LOB` bruker FOR UPDATE-setningsdelen i SQL SELECT-setningen, og du må ha en lokal transaksjon startet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but does not update the `LOB` on the server.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > En skriveoperasjon til en skrivebeskyttet `LOB` blir kanskje vellykket, men oppdateres ikke den `LOB` på serveren.

trans-unit.source: In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` is updated.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet, lokalt kopi av det `LOB` er oppdatert.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, later read operations on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> object might return the results of the write operation.
trans-unit.target: Derfor senere leseoperasjoner på den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>objekt kan returnere resultatene av Skriveoperasjonen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>

trans-unit.source: The desired length of the current <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref> stream in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Ønsket lengden på gjeldende <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref> dataflyt i byte.

trans-unit.source: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_CLOB" name="CLOB" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_NCLOB" name="NCLOB" href=""></xref> data types, this must be an even number.
trans-unit.target: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_CLOB" name="CLOB" href=""> </xref> og <xref uid="langword_csharp_NCLOB" name="NCLOB" href=""> </xref> datatyper, dette må være et partall.

trans-unit.source: A value specified in the value parameter for a or data type is not even.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som er angitt i den value parameteren for en eller datatypen er ikke enda.

trans-unit.source: -or- A value specified in the value parameter is less than zero or greater than 4 gigabytes.
trans-unit.target: - eller - en verdi som er angitt i den value parameteren er mindre enn null eller større enn 4 GB.

trans-unit.source: The operation is not within a transaction, the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref> object is null, or the connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: Operasjonen er ikke innenfor en transaksjon i <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref> objektet er null, eller tilkoblingen er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The object was closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: Objektet er lukket eller fjernet.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en Oracle-feil.

trans-unit.source: Gets the common language runtime stream value equivalent of the underlying value.
trans-unit.target: Henter common language runtime dataflyten verdien tegnekvivalenten for den underliggende verdien.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType> data types, Value returns the entire underlying data as a contiguous array of type `Byte[]`.
trans-unit.target: For <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType>datatyper, verdien returnerer hele underliggende dataene som en sammenhengende array av typen `Byte[]`.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType> and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType> data types, Value returns all the data as a `String` data type.
trans-unit.target: For <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType>og <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType>datatyper, verdi returnerer alle data som en `String` datatype.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType>

trans-unit.source: For null data, Value returns <xref:System.DBNull>.
trans-unit.target: For data som er null returnerer verdien <xref:System.DBNull>.</xref:System.DBNull>

trans-unit.source: By comparing the returned values, you can distinguish among empty data, null data, and data.
trans-unit.target: Ved å sammenligne de returnerte verdiene, du kan skille mellom tom data, null data og data.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A benefit of using `LOB` data types is the capability to retrieve large amounts of data in chunks at the client.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Fordelene ved å bruke `LOB` datatyper er muligheten til å hente store mengder data i biter på klienten.

trans-unit.source: However, when you use Value, you obtain all the data for the `LOB` column as one contiguous chunk, which can significantly increase application overhead.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid når du bruker verdi, du hente alle dataene for den `LOB` kolonnen som en sammenhengende gruppe, som kan øke programmet overhead betydelig.

trans-unit.source: For <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"></xref>, an array of type <xref uid="langword_csharp_Byte[]" name="Byte[]" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: For <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"></xref>, an array of type <xref uid="langword_csharp_Byte[]" name="Byte[]" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: For <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"></xref> and <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"></xref>, a <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: For <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"></xref> and <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"></xref>, a <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: For null data, <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: For null data <xref href="System.DBNull"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The object was closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: Objektet er lukket eller fjernet.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en Oracle-feil.

trans-unit.source: Writes a sequence of bytes to the current <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref> stream, and advances the current position within this stream by the number of bytes written.
trans-unit.target: Skriver en sekvens med byte til gjeldende <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref> flyten og flytter gjeldende plassering i denne dataflyten på antall byte skrevet.

trans-unit.source: If the write operation is successful, the position within the stream advances by the number of bytes written.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Skriveoperasjonen lykkes, flytter posisjonen i dataflyten på antall byte skrevet.

trans-unit.source: If an exception occurs, the position within the stream remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det oppstår et unntak, endres ikke posisjonen i dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: Writing beyond the end of `LOB` is allowed and enlarges the `LOB` by the number of bytes written.
trans-unit.target: Skriving utenfor slutten av `LOB` er tillatt og viser den `LOB` på antall byte skrevet.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle handles all `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data as Unicode.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework-dataleverandør for Oracle behandler alle `CLOB` og `NCLOB` data som Unicode.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when accessing `CLOB` and `NCLOB` data types, you are always dealing with the number of bytes, where each character is 2 bytes.
trans-unit.target: Derfor under tilgang til `CLOB` og `NCLOB` -datatyper du alltid har med antall byte, der hvert tegn er 2 byte.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a string of text containing three characters is saved as an `NCLOB` on an Oracle server where the character set is 4 bytes per character, and you perform a `Write` operation, you specify the length of the string as 6 bytes, although it is stored as 12 bytes on the server.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en streng som inneholder tre tegn lagres som for eksempel en `NCLOB` på en Oracle-server der tegnsettet 4 byte per tegn, og du utføre en `Write` operasjonen du angi lengden på strengen som 6 byte, selv om det er lagret som 12 byte på serveren.

trans-unit.source: To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started.
trans-unit.target: Ikke skrive til den `LOB`, må du har hentet av `LOB` bruker FOR UPDATE-setningsdelen i SQL SELECT-setningen, og du må ha en lokal transaksjon startet.

trans-unit.source: The following C# example demonstrates how to write to <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> objects.
trans-unit.target: C# eksemplet nedenfor viser hvordan du kan skrive til <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>objekter.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>

trans-unit.source: ``` public static void WriteLobExample(OracleCommand command) { //Note: Updating LOB data requires a transaction. command.Transaction = command.Connection.BeginTransaction(); //Select some data. // Table Schema: // "CREATE TABLE tablewithlobs (a int, b BLOB, c BLOB)"; // "INSERT INTO tablewithlobs values (1, 'AA', 'AAA')"; command.CommandText = "SELECT * FROM TableWithLobs FOR UPDATE"; OracleDataReader reader = command.ExecuteReader(); using(reader) { //Obtain the first row of data. reader.Read(); //Obtain both LOBs. OracleLob BLOB1 = reader.GetOracleLob(1); OracleLob BLOB2 = reader.GetOracleLob(2); //Perform any desired operations on the LOB, (read, position, and so on). //... //Example - Writing binary data (directly to the backend). //To write, you can use any of the stream classes, or write raw binary data using //the OracleLob write method. Writing character vs. binary is the same; //however note that character is always in terms of Unicode byte counts //(for example: even number of bytes - 2 bytes for every Unicode character). byte[] buffer = new byte[100]; buffer[0] = 0xCC; buffer[1] = 0xDD; BLOB1.Write(buffer, 0, 2); BLOB1.Position = 0; Console.WriteLine(BLOB1.LobType + ".Write(" + buffer + ", 0, 2) => " + BLOB1.Value); //Example - Copying data into another LOB. long actual = BLOB1.CopyTo(BLOB2); Console.WriteLine(BLOB1.LobType + ".CopyTo(" + BLOB2.Value + ") => " + actual); //Commit the transaction now that everything succeeded. //Note: On error, Transaction.Dispose is called (from the using statement) //and will automatically roll-back the pending transaction. command.Transaction.Commit(); } } ``` > [!NOTE] > A write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but does not update the `LOB` on the server.
trans-unit.target: ``` public static void WriteLobExample(OracleCommand command) { //Note: Updating LOB data requires a transaction. command.Transaction = command.Connection.BeginTransaction(); //Select some data. // Table Schema: // "CREATE TABLE tablewithlobs (a int, b BLOB, c BLOB)"; // "INSERT INTO tablewithlobs values (1, 'AA', 'AAA')"; command.CommandText = "SELECT * FROM TableWithLobs FOR UPDATE"; OracleDataReader reader = command.ExecuteReader(); using(reader) { //Obtain the first row of data. reader.Read(); //Obtain both LOBs. OracleLob BLOB1 = reader.GetOracleLob(1); OracleLob BLOB2 = reader.GetOracleLob(2); //Perform any desired operations on the LOB, (read, position, and so on). //... //Example - Writing binary data (directly to the backend). //To write, you can use any of the stream classes, or write raw binary data using //the OracleLob write method. Writing character vs. binary is the same; //however note that character is always in terms of Unicode byte counts //(for example: even number of bytes - 2 bytes for every Unicode character). byte[] buffer = new byte[100]; buffer[0] = 0xCC; buffer[1] = 0xDD; BLOB1.Write(buffer, 0, 2); BLOB1.Position = 0; Console.WriteLine(BLOB1.LobType + ".Write(" + buffer + ", 0, 2) => " + BLOB1.Value); //Example - Copying data into another LOB. long actual = BLOB1.CopyTo(BLOB2); Console.WriteLine(BLOB1.LobType + ".CopyTo(" + BLOB2.Value + ") => " + actual); //Commit the transaction now that everything succeeded. //Note: On error, Transaction.Dispose is called (from the using statement) //and will automatically roll-back the pending transaction. command.Transaction.Commit(); } } ``` > [!NOTE]> En skriveoperasjon til en skrivebeskyttet `LOB` blir kanskje vellykket, men oppdateres ikke den `LOB` på serveren.

trans-unit.source: In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` is updated.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet, lokalt kopi av det `LOB` er oppdatert.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, later read operations on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> object might return the results of the write operation.
trans-unit.target: Derfor senere leseoperasjoner på den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>objekt kan returnere resultatene av Skriveoperasjonen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes.

trans-unit.source: This method copies the number of bytes specified in `count` from `buffer` to the current stream.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kopierer antall byte som er angitt i `count` fra `buffer` til gjeldende dataflyten.

trans-unit.target: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_CLOB" name="CLOB" href=""> </xref> og <xref uid="langword_csharp_NCLOB" name="NCLOB" href=""> </xref> datatyper, dette må være et partall.

trans-unit.source: Writes a byte to the current position in the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref> stream, and advances the position within the stream by one byte.
trans-unit.target: Skriver en byte til gjeldende plassering i den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref> flyten og flytter posisjonen i dataflyten av én byte.

trans-unit.source: If the write operation is successful, the position within the stream advances by one byte.

trans-unit.source: If an exception occurs, the position within the stream remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det oppstår et unntak, endres ikke posisjonen i dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: Writing beyond the end of the `LOB` is allowed and enlarges the `LOB` by one byte.
trans-unit.target: Skriving utenfor slutten av den `LOB` er tillatt og viser den `LOB` av én byte.

trans-unit.source: To write to the `LOB`, you must have retrieved the `LOB` using the FOR UPDATE clause in the SQL SELECT statement, and you must have a local transaction started.
trans-unit.target: Ikke skrive til den `LOB`, må du har hentet av `LOB` bruker FOR UPDATE-setningsdelen i SQL SELECT-setningen, og du må ha en lokal transaksjon startet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A write operation to a read-only `LOB` might succeed, but does not update the `LOB` on the server.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > En skriveoperasjon til en skrivebeskyttet `LOB` blir kanskje vellykket, men oppdateres ikke den `LOB` på serveren.

trans-unit.source: In this case, however, the local copy of the `LOB` is updated.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet, lokalt kopi av det `LOB` er oppdatert.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, later read operations on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> object might return the results of the write operation.
trans-unit.target: Derfor senere leseoperasjoner på den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>objekt kan returnere resultatene av Skriveoperasjonen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>

trans-unit.source: The byte to write to the stream.
trans-unit.target: Byte til å skrive til dataflyten.
